title: syscall: PtracePeekUser
body:
We already have [`syscall.PtracePeekData`](https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#PtracePeekData) and [`syscall.PtracePeekText`](https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#PtracePeekText) but not `syscall.PtracePeekUser`.

Any thoughts about adding it too? If it makes sense, I could prepare a patch.
